item.title: Garden Update DIY Projects Plant Growth Tips
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Hi friends this is an update of things that I have been working on for the past couple of months in the garden. This includes some DIY projects, some upcoming...

The post Garden Update DIY Projects Plant Growth Tips appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends this is an update of things that I have been working on for the past couple of months in the garden. This includes some DIY projects, some upcoming video content, some plant growth updates, and a few tips. Hope you all like it.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 00:44 Eggplant Grown Indoors
  • 01:27 DIY Solar Dehydrator
  • 03:10 DIY Irrigation Timer
  • 05:28 Paper Towel Germination
  • 06:21 Monkey Protection Net
  • 08:17 DIY Self Watering Pots
  • 10:08 DIY Wind Chime
  • 11:48 DIY Organic Hydroponics System
  • 14:33 Self Seeded Papaya Trees
  • 16:55 Dumb Cane Plant
  • 17:48 DIY Compost bins
  • 19:23 Petunia Plants
  • 20:00 Yellow Trumpet Bush Plant
  • 20:53 Chinese Orange Plant
  • 22:00 Turmeric Antifungal
  • 22:46 Petunia Cuttings Propagation

Eggplant Grown Indoors


DIY Solar Dehydrator


DIY Irrigation Timer


Paper Towel Germination


Monkey Protection Net


DIY Self Watering Pots


DIY Wind Chime


DIY Organic Hydroponics System


Self Seeded Papaya Trees


Dumb Cane Plant


DIY Compost Bins


Petunia Plants


Yellow Trumpet Bush Plant


Chinese Orange Plant


Turmeric Antifungal


Petunia Cuttings Propagation

I hope friends, you liked this garden update video where I showed you the different DIY projects, plant growth updates, and shared some gardening tips from my terrace and backyard garden. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post Garden Update DIY Projects Plant Growth Tips appeared first on Plants My Love.

item.title: Rainy Season Vegetable Terrace Garden Tour
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Hi friends in this video I will take you on a tour of my terrace vegetable garden. We will see plants like lemongrass, mint, okra (ladies finger), eggplant (brinjal), chilies...

The post Rainy Season Vegetable Terrace Garden Tour appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video I will take you on a tour of my terrace vegetable garden. We will see plants like lemongrass, mint, okra (ladies finger), eggplant (brinjal), chilies (hot peppers), and cherry tomato. This is a new video format an impromptu vlog-style hopefully you all will like it. Stay tuned for more videos.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 0:25 Okra, Ladies Finger, Bhindi Plant
  • 1:25 Lemon Grass
  • 2:50 Cherry Tomato
  • 3:42 Bioponics Mint Plant (Detailed Video to come soon)
  • 6:05 Eggplant, Brinjal
  • 8:45 Chilli Plant, Hot Pepper
  • 12:30 Conditions for Growing (Light Required)
  • 14:20 Vlog Impromptu Style Video Format

I hope friends, you liked this video on our Vegetable Terrace Garden Tour. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post Rainy Season Vegetable Terrace Garden Tour appeared first on Plants My Love.

The post My Small Terrace Garden Tour appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video we will tour our small terrace garden. I will share with you some details about each plant how it was grown and the challenges faced during the growing.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 00:45 Cuttings Zone / Plant Incubation Area
  • 2:10 Drip Irrigation System
  • 2:40 Baby Snake Plant
  • 3:10 Luffa / Sponge Gourd Plant
  • 4:12 Snake Plant Leaf Cuttings
  • 4:33 Malabar Spinach
  • 5:00 Mother Snake Plant
  • 5:20 Indian Summer Spinach Plant
  • 5:40 Ladies Finger/ Okra Plant
  • 7:00 Sweet Potato Plant
  • 7:34 Brinjal /Egg Plant and Chilli Sapling
  • 8:00 Sweet Potato Tubers
  • 8:30 Papaya Plant
  • 9:30 Baby Curry Leaf Plants
  • 9:55 Mint Plants
  • 11:12 Malabar Spinach Back Story

I hope friends, you liked this tour of my terrace garden. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.
